actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Civil and Constitutional Rights.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Civil and Constitutional Rights

official_title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to limit the number of years that a person may serve consecutively in the Senate, in the House of Representatives, and in ambassadorships.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Limits the number of years a person may serve consecutively as a Member of Congress or in ambassadorships to 12.

titles.title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to limit the number of years that a person may serve consecutively in the Senate, in the House of Representatives, and in ambassadorships.
